name: part_012
file: tmp_【#冥ハロ2025】白上フブキ生誕３DLIVE「冥界Halloween Night!」【白上フブキ⧸ホロライブ】 [7Tm7dVsTPBk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_012.mov

scenes.description: Shirakami Fubuki, in her librarian role, delivers a closing monologue for her birthday live.
Instrumental transition music with credits scrolling.
Announcement of the 'FBKINGDOM ANTHEM' Live Blu-ray release.
Highlight reel of the live performance featuring 'Say! Fanfare!'.
Static ending card with handwritten messages from the performers.

subtitles.original: ハロウィンパーティー、いかがでしたでしょうか？
subtitles.english: How was the Halloween party?

subtitles.original: ちゃんとこちら側の王国に戻って来られていますか？
subtitles.english: Were you able to return to this kingdom safely?

subtitles.original: 冥界の女王様に気に入られてしまうと、魂を奪われてしまって帰って来られませんからね。
subtitles.english: If the Queen of the Underworld takes a liking to you, she'll steal your soul and you won't be able to come back.

subtitles.original: 戻って来られてラッキーでした... なんて。
subtitles.english: You were lucky to be able to return... just kidding.

subtitles.original: あ、今日のお話はどうでしたか？楽しかったでしょうか？
subtitles.english: Ah, how were today's stories? Did you enjoy them?

subtitles.original: 私が特にお気に入りは探偵のお話でして、今回お聞かせできてとても嬉しかったです。
subtitles.english: My particular favorite was the detective story, and I'm very happy I could share it with you this time.

subtitles.original: そうだ、いつかあなたのお話も聞かせてくださいね。
subtitles.english: That's right, please tell me your story someday, too.

subtitles.original: もしかすると、あの本にあなたのお話も書き記されるかもしれませんよ。
subtitles.english: Perhaps your story will be recorded in that book as well.

subtitles.original: なんといっても、摩訶不思議な本ですから。
subtitles.english: After all, it's a mysterious book.

subtitles.original: 何が起こるか、司書である私にもわかりません。
subtitles.english: Even I, the librarian, don't know what will happen.

subtitles.original: さて、そろそろお時間ですね。
subtitles.english: Well, it's about time.

subtitles.original: またお話が聞きたくなりましたら、いつでもこの王国図書館へお越しください。
subtitles.english: If you ever want to hear a story again, please come to this Kingdom Library anytime.

subtitles.original: それでは、さようなら。
subtitles.english: Well then, goodbye.

subtitles.original: ハジマリはきっとひとつの願い
subtitles.english: The beginning was surely a single wish

subtitles.original: それを抱いて私は生まれた
subtitles.english: I was born holding onto it

subtitles.original: 孤独な夜空
subtitles.english: In the lonely night sky

subtitles.original: 震える指で 点と点をつなげよう
subtitles.english: With trembling fingers, let's connect the dots

subtitles.original: LIVE Blu-ray 発売決定！
subtitles.english: LIVE Blu-ray Release Decided!

subtitles.original: すこん部の皆さん！準備はできてますか？
subtitles.english: Everyone in Sukon-bu! Are you ready?

subtitles.original: Say! Fanfare! 行きますよー！
subtitles.english: Say! Fanfare! Here we go!

subtitles.original: Say! ほらどの顔あげて
subtitles.english: Say! Look, lift up your face

subtitles.original: みんなで手をとれば
subtitles.english: If we all hold hands

subtitles.original: High! まだまだ道半ば
subtitles.english: High! We're still only halfway there

subtitles.original: 世界を越えよう
subtitles.english: Let's go beyond the world

subtitles.original: Say! ほら推し推しがまま
subtitles.english: Say! Look, just as you like

subtitles.original: 止まらない全力ですから
subtitles.english: Because I'm going at full power without stopping

subtitles.original: 夢を書き換えたら
subtitles.english: If we rewrite our dreams

subtitles.original: 追いかけ続けよう
subtitles.english: Let's keep chasing them

subtitles.original: ともにつなぐファンファーレ Go!
subtitles.english: The fanfare that connects us, Go!

subtitles.original: Yeah!
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: ハイ！ハイ！うーここ！
subtitles.english: Yes! Yes! Woo, here!

subtitles.original: なかなか苦い姿 自分自身の
subtitles.english: Quite a bitter sight, of myself

subtitles.original: 輝きを見失った
subtitles.english: When I lost sight of my brilliance

subtitles.original: 時には思い出してね
subtitles.english: Please remember

subtitles.original: 僕らのステージは
subtitles.english: Our stage

subtitles.original: 君がいるから輝く
subtitles.english: Shines because you are here

subtitles.original: Oh Yeah! 無数の星の中
subtitles.english: Oh Yeah! Among countless stars

subtitles.original: Oh Yeah! 光を君がくれた
subtitles.english: Oh Yeah! You gave me light

subtitles.original: Oh Yeah Yeah Yeah Yeah! もっと
subtitles.english: Oh Yeah Yeah Yeah Yeah! More

subtitles.original: Oh Yeah! 越えて行けるさ
subtitles.english: Oh Yeah! We can go beyond

subtitles.original: Oh Yeah! スーパーノバ起こせ今
subtitles.english: Oh Yeah! Create a supernova now

subtitles.original: Oh Yeah! 何度だって飛べる
subtitles.english: Oh Yeah! We can fly any number of times

subtitles.original: Oh Yeah Yeah Yeah Yeah! これは
subtitles.english: Oh Yeah Yeah Yeah Yeah! This is

subtitles.original: まぎれもなく僕らの奇跡
subtitles.english: None other than our miracle

subtitles.original: Hi Friends!
subtitles.english: Hi Friends!

subtitles.original: Blu-ray 発売決定！！詳細は後日！お楽しみに！！
subtitles.english: Blu-ray Release Decided!! Details at a later date! Look forward to it!!

subtitles.original: Best wishes! すこん部ー！
subtitles.english: Best wishes! Sukon-bu!
